name: Carrot Souffle
steps: Cook carrots in boiling water to cover, 15 minutes or until tender, drain. Cooks tons faster if you cover the pan and cut the baby carrots in halt. It took almost an hour the first time we didn't cover the pan (always takes me awhile)
In blender or food processor put carrots, butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder and cinnamon.
Process until smooth scrapping down sides. Spoon into 2 lightly greased (Pam) 1.5 quart souffle or baking dishes.
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until set and lightly browned.
Cook and puree carrots the night before. Next morning add remaining ingredients. I have even put all the ingredients together in the morning and it worked fine.
